name: Boston Tea Party Cheltenham
description: We are a West country born & family owned independent small caf√© chain  serving simply & well prepared food & drinks made with great ingredients, skill and love.  Ethically sourced, affordable & feel-good - made from scratch onsite everyday.

posts.message:
All acts will get dinner and a few drinks on the house. Still a few places left if you are interested so let us know at cheltenham@bostonteaparty.co.uk 
üç∫üé§üéºüç∑ü¶Ñ
Overdo it this weekend? Start the week right with a deliciously healthy raw veg smoothie.
Sit back and relax this Sunday with one of our handmade scones and a nice pot of tea.

2 slots have come available for some great local musicians looking for a cool place to gig this coming Friday 7th October. Message us on here, or via cheltenham@bostonteaparty.co.uk. We'd love to hear from you!
We've pancakes for all sizes to keep the little (and big ones) happy this weekend.
Our taste experts have paired our cakes with the perfect teas. Take a look http://ow.ly/S1jT3040PKn
Top Tips: How you can be more productive today http://ow.ly/tz1M3040LlG
We've released another new Brew Guide today! All you need to know about making top quality coffee from home. http://ow.ly/eiiX3040N0A
Tangy chipotle toastie, oozing with melted mozzarella. Order as whole or a half if you're less peckish.
Have you heard about our award winning, gluten free GiFt bread from Hobbs House bakery? You can have it with any of our bready dishes to make them gluten free. http://ow.ly/zf6e303YMpz
Is there a problem with coffee pods? An interesting article on the subject, plus our guide to making a quality cup at home.  http://ow.ly/OECc304nkUG

Interested in showcasing your musical talent? Drop us a message to perform at our local best local live music night. 
#Hoxton #cider #music #night #live #local #october7
Brew? 358 years ago today was the first advert for tea, here's a potted history of the humble cup of tea. http://ow.ly/ySDF304uevw
There's plenty to choose from on our kids' menu. Make sure to enter our colouring in competition too, you could win a free family meal!
Making plans for the weekend? Why not treat the family with brunch, we've even got yummy dishes for little ones on our new kids menu.
Super proud to pick up the Cafe Life Cafe Design of the Year Award yesterday for our beautiful Alfred Street, Bath cafe. See what the fuss is about in our gallery. http://ow.ly/VjHG304rTzD
How fair really is Fairtrade? The answer is not what you think. Find out more in our blog http://ow.ly/BVEa303Yjfs
We just can't stop looking at this Coffee, Cardamom & Walnut cake!
Which one is your favourite vegetarian breakfast? Granola or a veggie fry up?
Which one is your favourite vegetarian breakfast? Granola or a veggie fry up?
Who's tried our eggy bacon tarts? They've become our bitesized breakfast essential.
It's finally the weekend. Relax.
There's food for 'big ones' and 'little ones' this weekend on our kids menu.

events.name: Live Music Night sponsored by Hoxton Cidersmiths
events.description: Live Music this Friday evening from 6pm until 9pm, showcasing the best in local talent, alongside our usual plentiful array of amazing food and drink. Sponsored by our lovely cider friends at Hoxton, with all proceeds going to local charity, The Butterfly Garden. Volunteer performers still being considered via cheltenham@bostonteaparty.co.uk.

events.name: BTP Cheltenham host open mic night in collaboration with Hoxton Cidersmiths
events.description:
Join us for our first open mic night hosted with Hoxton Cidersmiths  - live music, open mic, beer and burger deals, great atmosphere & location.
FREE ENTRY!!! 

In aid of the The Butterfly Garden Charity! 

Acts playing so far...

Katie Collins 
Chris Smee Music 
Tom Spice
JPDL

25% off for students all night with valid ID!!!!! (Not on existing offers).
